# Support

Thank you for your interest in Axe MCP Server!

## Getting Help

For technical support, bug reports, and feature requests, please contact our support team through one of the following channels:

### For Paid Customers

- **Email**: [helpdesk@deque.com](mailto:helpdesk@deque.com)
- **Support Portal**: [support.deque.com](https://support.deque.com)

Our support team provides:
- SLA-backed response times for active subscriptions
- Access to your account and configuration information
- Direct escalation to product engineering when needed
- Priority handling of critical issues

### For Sales Inquiries

If you're interested in purchasing Axe DevTools for Web (and thus Axe MCP Server) or have questions about pricing and licensing:

- [Request a demo](https://accessibility.deque.com/request-a-demo)
- [Product information](https://www.deque.com/axe/mcp-server/)
- [Contact form](https://www.deque.com/contact)

## Documentation

Before reaching out for support, please check our comprehensive documentation:

- **Setup Guide**: [Getting Started with axe MCP Server](https://docs.deque.com/devtools-server/4.0.0/en/axe-mcp-server)
- **API Key Management**: [axe Account Portal Guide](https://docs.deque.com/devtools-server/4.0.0/en/welcome)
- **Configuration Options**: [Advanced Configuration](https://docs.deque.com/devtools-server/4.0.0/en/axe-configuration)

## What to Include in Your Support Request

To help us assist you quickly, please include:

1. **Product Version**: Docker image tag (e.g., `dequesystems/axe-mcp-server:latest`)
2. **MCP Client**: Which client you're using (Claude Desktop, VS Code, Cursor, etc.)
3. **Environment**: Operating system and Docker version
4. **Issue Description**: What you expected to happen vs. what actually happened
5. **Steps to Reproduce**: How we can recreate the issue
6. **Error Messages**: Any error messages or logs you're seeing

## Community

Stay updated on product announcements and releases:

- [Join the axe community](https://accessibility.deque.com/axe-community)
- [Blog](https://www.deque.com/blog/)
- [Deque Systems on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/deque-systems/)

## Why We Don't Use GitHub Issues

We use our centralized support system to ensure:

- **Faster response times** with SLA-backed support for paid customers
- **Better tracking** of your support history and account information
- **Proper escalation** to specialized teams when needed
- **Security** for discussions that may involve your specific configuration or API keys

We appreciate your understanding!
